website_summaries.verdict: Soft and luxurious. A great choice for the skin and hair.
pros: Buyer gets a choice of colors
cons: Must be washed carefully to avoid damage

website_summaries.verdict: This incredibly popular hypoallergenic pillowcase is the height of luxury with its silky, quality build.
pros: Extremely soft silk at 600 thread count
Especially helpful for smoothing frizzy hair
Built-in hidden zipper for full protection
Available in a wide variety of colors
cons: A few customers had issues with the zippers breaking
Color can be altered from washing

customer_reviews.title: Super soft silk fabric on both sides
customer_reviews.text: Super soft silk fabric on both sides, unlike another brand that I tried and had cotton on the other side. I love that it has a zipper and won't slide off at night.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Not soft, not comfortable, arrived dirty. I tried to return, but I would have to pay for shipping and I'd end up losing money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ivory color stains!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course, as soon as the window to return this item closes, something goes wrong. I purchased this pillow case in ivory and it has horrible stains all over it. I don't wear makeup to bed, and my face is washed at night. I have washed, bleached and stain treated this case to no avail. The stain won't budge! I just don't get it. I have no idea what has caused such discoloration on this fabric, and the fact that it won't wash out is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged and NOT the Quality I Expected
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and much to my disappointment, already had two large pulls - one that ran nearly the entire length of the pillowcase and another that ran in the opposite direction. It seems as though it would be comfortable but it’s very thin and not the quality that I had expected for the price and great reviews. I ordered white and it’s almost completely see-through. If you have pillows that have a print on them, I wouldn’t get a light color, as the print would certainly be able to be seen thru the pillowcase. Very disappointed and would not recommend purchasing this product, based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kalex824

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT silk. This is a really cheap scratchy material. DO NOT BUY!! ITS A BAD FAKE!!! Unfourtinaly it’s not even Satin. It feels like that cheap polyester lining inside of a cheap coat.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Washed it cold, on delicate + air dry = Not silky AT ALL anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product in the mail and was so excited to have a silk pillowcase! But, as with everything else I buy, I washed it first, with EXTREMELY gentle detergent, a few items of like color, cold, delicate cycle (PER THE CARE INSTRUCTIONS ON THE TAG). I hung it to dry and now it's very starchy and rough feeling. I'm really disappointed as this was quite pricey, and now I feel like I'm just better off using my cotton/polyester pillowcases-- they are softer at this point. I'll be looking into a return.
customer_reviews.author: Lac

customer_reviews.title: Washed according to instructions - totally changed the pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my curly hair from breakage and frizz. However, when I washed it (according to the instructions!!!!), it changed the texture entirely! For that, I would like to give it 1 star, but I gave it 3 stars because it is still gentler on my hair then a standard pillowcase. I would NOT buy another one nor would I recommend this particular one because, for $20+ for ONE pillowcase (I don’t care WHAT it’s made of), I would expect it to hold up after one wash! I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Teach Kids

customer_reviews.title: Nice to sleep on and improved my skin
customer_reviews.text: I kept breaking out in the exact same spot and couldn't figure out why. I was washing my sheets regularly and decided to give this silk pillowcase a try. Not only did it stop my breakouts, but my hair looks nice in the morning too. My husband has stated more than once of how nice my hair looks. I already use a great skin routine and now this just helps. :) Feels cooler too then my other sheets too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I really doubt this is silk, but you get what you pay for. It’s pretty soft and it has held up in the washing machine for a few months now. Lack of packaging makes it a poor gift choice (it just comes in a clear plastic sleeve with no info about what it is). But it’s nice enough for a now!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: The company sent my a replacement and after one wash came out like this and stained my other older one
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke on my first purchase. The company sent my a replacement and after one wash came out like this and stained my other older one. Unbeleavable. The rest of the load came out just fine...
customer_reviews.author: Mia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft and silky feel against my face and head. So far, it seems just fine. I have only hand washed it once so far, rolled in a towel to blot, and hung up to dry. It took a very short time to air-dry, and there were no wrinkles. Hand washing is simple and very quick... of course, machine washing would be even easier. If I find any problems at a later date after using it regularly for a few months, I will update. But so far, I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: Love the Alaska Bear natural silk pillowcase!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my pillow case for maybe two weeks. I love it. I am amazed how my hair looks when I get up, as opposed to how it used to look! Much like it did when I went to bed, no more Dr. Zorba hair. :) I have also noticed no pillow marks on my face after a night of rock hard sleeping. I would buy this pillowcase again. So happy that you make this product available. I have been hand washing it and hanging up to dry in the shower. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly soft but not great. That's expected for a lower quality silk pillowcase. Material is very thin and wrinkles easily. I have noticed a change in the condition of my hair in the mornings, hopefully it'll be good for my eyelashes too!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillowcase because of the benefits to my skin and hair, and honestly haven't felt the benefits on either. Also, if you are prone to sweat or heat at night, it's not recommendable. What truly has been a pain is the zipper: aesthetically yes, it's delicate and hardly shows, but the handle is pointy – not deadly but uncomfortable– enough that it will point out and hurt at times. **UPDATE** I was contacted by Alaska Bear and was offered new pillowcases or a refund which is very valuable. Because of this, I can suggest you buy them and if not fully satisfied, contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Castañeda

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase has made such a difference in my curly hair. Others dried out my hair but this one doesn’t. I could tell a difference in a week and even more after about a month. I like that the zipper keeps it on the pillow. I’ve had it for almost two years and it has darkened a little but still in good shape and I do have darker sheets so it’s probably picking up a little color from them after so long. I expect I could get at least another year out of it if not more than that. When it does wear out I will be ordering another one just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Boni Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Impressive find!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a silk pillowcase and I am so impressed! The pillow cases I have seen before finding this one were at a much higher price point and it kept me from wanting to buy. Upon arrival, it was exactly as pictured and softer than I imagined. I have to be cool when I sleep and I was worried about the silk making me hot. It is actually cooler than my cotton pillowcase I used before. I was apprehensive that it would actually help my hair, but it does! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Triple C Farmhouse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handwash.
customer_reviews.text: Has NOT fallen apart at the seams, as the other reviews indicated. I personally think it's rather well made. I'm very happy with my pillowcase. I sleep like a princess and wish I'd gotten one years ago. I'll never go back to cotton. I take my pillow wherever I go. About to order another in case I forget my pillow. Can't imagine having to sleep without it. :) Don't think I'd be able to, now that I'm the "Princess And The Pea". LOL
customer_reviews.author: Gaylejoon

customer_reviews.title: Great pillowcase, and soft on your hair!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this pillowcase been all my life?! I got my hair cut, and my stylist said "Your hair is really dry and coarse in the back" I told her it always has been- just in that spot- & she told me to get a silk pillowcase- because otherwise, we rub our head all around when we sleep and it is hard on our hair & it breaks it and damages it. With silk- (and satin- but she said silk is better) your hair will slide. This damage can also happen with car headrests. The pillowcase is very soft and nice. Now I just need one for my car! Like a silk bucket seat headrest cover! (Hint hint Alaska Bear!)
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: It really is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I am picky and I really really like this pillow case. I was worried - you never know when you buy online. Lots of people can say they like something, but they may not have the same standards as you. Well, I'm a person with high expectations. I recommend this pillow case. I gave it as a gift to someone who has allergies, and I bought another color for myself. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Lillybeth

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillowcase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pillowcase for 2 weeks. The fabric is so smooth and silky and feels cool on my face. I like the zippered end and the zipper is mostly hidden, so it doesn't click against the headboard of the bed. It definitely helps prevent morning face wrinkles and keeps my shoulder length hair from looking too crazy. I washed it with my sheets but put it in a net laundry bag and air dried it. It came out fine. I don't think I can ever go back to a regular cotton pillowcase after using this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Soft silk but watch zipper
customer_reviews.text: I love sleeping on a silk pillowcase as it is so much better for my hair. This is a good quality pillow case and so much cheaper than an $80 brand on Sephora. I wash them on gentle and then air dry and it works fine. I have 5 silk pillow cases from this company, but one of the zippers won't unzip and is stuck on the pillow. I will have to cut it off. I don't think the zipper is a great quality. I am emailing the company to see if they will replace it. Just be extra careful when zipping on and off--go slow.
customer_reviews.author: stylekitten

customer_reviews.title: Smoother hair and face
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I’m letting my gray hair grow out, & silk is gentler on that texture of hair. I definitely notice less breakage of hair, & a side perk is that I wake up with less puffiness in my face. The company was very quick to respond when I had an issue with the first one that was sent. I’m very pleased with this purchase. Much better than paying $50 for one at Bed Bath & Beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Metz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I read some mixed reviews on this pillow case but decided to try for myself. It’s very good quality for the money! I’m a 34 year old single guy that doesn’t put much thought into laundry but had absolutely no problems washing the case. Came out just as smooth as the day I got it. I don’t know why others had issues with that. It actually does make a difference with skin and hair. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don’t know why I waited so long to buy this pillow case. I have curly hair and this helps keep it from drying out. Also, when I straighten my hair , it keeps it from frizzing out. AND I’ve noticed less acne breakouts. So overall , I’d buy these for all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: cyrni

customer_reviews.title: Changed my sleeping routine ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillowcases. Very soft and beautiful ivory color. I hand washed these in cool water with mild detergent and hung dry. Dried a little wrinkled but wrinkled flattened out once on the pillow for a couple days. 5 ⭐️ for product and customer service. Will order more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Sharelle Slocumb

customer_reviews.title: Very rough on skin. Feels abrasive.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t feel like real silk or as silky as the mm count it claims to be. Pillowcase is very scratchy and rough. It feels like it catches my skin in an abrasive way, similar to how microfiber towels feel. I am concerned it is too rough on skin. I don’t understand how it can claim it is good for hair or skin, or that it is better than cotton. I would return this item but I tossed the packaging. Don’t ignore the bad reviews; get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Drews

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillowcases. They are big enough to take in my queen-sized pillows. They are smooth and very comfortable to lie on. They have helped my face and my hair since I have been sleeping on them. I highly recommend these silk pillow cases for comfort and protection for skin and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Graves

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Silk Pillowcases & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these from Alasaka Bear. I was having issues with one of them when it came to maintenance so I contacted customer support. Their customer service responds quickly and is eager to help. They were very understanding and seemed genuinely interested in making sure that I was completely satisfied. They sent me a replacement pillow case and I now have absolutely no issues. I highly recommend these to anyone, not just because the pillow cases are of very high quality and are insanely comfortable, but because their customer service is impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Retrie Bution

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow case
customer_reviews.text: I love my pillow case I bought one to see how I liked it. So I planning on buying more for my king pillows .My hair is natural curly and has been breaking so I thought I would try this. And I do not wake up with my hair looking like I stuck my finger in a light socket. Helps keep the moisture in. I hand wash it and it does not take long to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: MMGrimes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Silk Pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait for this pillowcase to arrive. I didn't even wash it, I so wanted to try it out the night I rec'd it. It does have a nice satiny feel to it. And the color goes with everything. The only thing that I was hoping that it would do; it didn't deliver. But, maybe it's me and the way I sleep. I was hoping that it would help with the ceases that I wake up with around my eyes in the morning. I still had them :( All in all, I would recommend this pillowcase. The price was good, along with being delivered very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Buddha's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair where it belongs... on my head
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase is a zippered one. It’s a plastic zipper so it doesn’t pull on the fabric. The silk is so soft and the color is a pearly white. My hair doesn’t pull so I’m keeping most of it. It’s great for when hair tends to fall out after giving birth. (Nobody ever told me about that) but now I’m happy to let any new mama know about this lovely tip. You’re welcome!
customer_reviews.author: Honest consumer

customer_reviews.title: Stylist Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not convinced this is any better for my hair than cotton, but I still use it. I have been machine washing and drying (gentle cycle, low heat dry) without a problem, so no need to be overly fussy unless your washer and dryer are on the basic side. Mine are front load with multiple cycles that do what they say. I bought white and ruined it when the toner my stylist applied wasn't completely rinsed from my hair. No way to get it out. Unless you're pristine, don't get white!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help improve my skin. The effects on my skin have been marginal, HOWEVER it had the unintended effect of making my very long, fine hair significantly less frizzy in the mornings. I got the unbleached cream/white one and it looks good, except I've gotten a shocking amount of blood on it over time, especially given that I don't know how any of it has gotten there. None of it has washed out at all. So don't get blood on it, I guess lol
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulous. Great for you hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE THESE! I just gave two to a friend as part of a wedding gift and she is in love. I think I will have to order them by the dozen so I can still have one for me as my whole family covets them and is stealing them away. They are great for curly hair. You wake up and your hair doesn't look like a rat's nest. I've read that they are also great for your skin so am watching to see if that is true. Updates to come!! Thank you for a fabulous product.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Utter luxury at a great price ...!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this silk pillowcase yet, but right out of the gate I can't believe how wonderful it looks & feels ...! I am so impressed with all of the Alaska Bear items I have ordered. They seem to be so well and finely made, and this is no exception. I feel like I hardly ever see quality like this in products these days, especially at the reasonable prices they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the pillow case. Have already washed it twice in cold water, dried in the air, and it has kept its softness. I highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Has really helped son's acne
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. I love the one I use and the one I got for my son has really helped with his acne. Yes my pillow can slip out of the case at times but that has more to do with my tossing and turning then the product. I highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Great For Moisture Retention
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a silk pillowcase that doesn’t suck the moisture from my face and hair. I’m so glad I found the Alaska Bear silk pillowcase! My skin and hair have definitely benefited, especially since I live in a dry climate. I hand wash it and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Silky
customer_reviews.text: I have a dermatography which leaves ugly welts on my skin from pillow wrinkles. I also get frizzy hair. I bought this pillowcase hoping to alleviate both. So far, so good. I hand wash it in a plastic mixing bowl, hang it from a skirt hanger and it dries quickly on a sunny or breezy day. I just received it, so I can’t tell about it’s durability, but it’s well made. So I’m sure it'll last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Maruchi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I did not really believe that a pillow case could make a difference but it really has so bought a king size to take when I travel to hotels and makes all the difference. Seriously recommend if you want to be more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ebc

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase seems to be exactly as described. Very soft and comfortable. Will need to take with when I travel because I don't want to sleep on anything else now. I do think it keeps my hair from getting so dry and tangled at night.
customer_reviews.author: LMHERSH

customer_reviews.title: no more bed head
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a silk pillowcase for awhile. Now I am wondering why I waited so long. It is so much better than a regular pillowcase. No more frizzies or bed head hair. Also good for the skin, since it doesn't mess with face creams. So soft and special. The zippered end keeps the pillow securely inside and it is very roomy for various pillow sizes. I ❤ it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Woody

customer_reviews.title: great pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: cool to the touch, thick enough silk, fyi - has a zipper which was strange at first but doesnt interfere with comfort at all. definitely great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: askolga

customer_reviews.title: If you want to rejuvenate while you sleep, this is the answer!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. The one I bought fits a standard sized pillow. I've been wanting one for a while. I'm not sure why I waited so long! The natural amino acids in the silk will help renew your skin. You also don't like wake up with sleeping wrinkles! It also is great for your hair...it allows your hair to slide as you move creating less mess and frizz when you wake up. I've washed mine in th delicate cycle with cold water and laid flat to dry. Comes out looking brand new every time!
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I have used another brand in the past but it only came in envelope style closure. Alaska Bear has a zipper and I was relieved that it is a quality zipper and works smoothly. I have a regular pillow that is quite puffy, so ordered the queen size for a roomier fit. Maybe the regular size would have done it, as this is a little big, but not overly so. The quality of the silk is good, I think. Soft, after washing, and contrary to instructions, I wash it in my front loading machine, which is gentle enough. so far it's held up well. I do touch it up with a light iron.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Fransene

customer_reviews.title: Soft but strong silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pillowcase. It is soft but strong enough to stand up to frequent washing. I washed it in the machine in a wash bag on the delicate setting. This one is silk on both sides, unlined, with a good quality zip closure. The color is white but not bleached-white, and goes with my ivory sheets. I bought this as an alternative to wearing a silk headscarf to bed to protect my hair from breakage. But, even my husband wants one - it's really nice.
customer_reviews.author: beautyscout

customer_reviews.title: I woke up like this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see anything wrong with sleeping on my cotton pillow case. But I noticed my hair was thinning out in the back. I was researching silk/satin pillowcases and saw that silk was the better buy BUT I wasn't willing to shell out $100 for a pillowcase. I saw a natural black hair care blogger on TV speak of the benefits of silk pillowcases. I purchased 2 of these pillowcases in white and I've noticed that when I wake up, my bedhead isn't as bad. I'll see how I look after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty. Doesn’t solve all hair and skin issues, but very comfy. Easy care. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft pillowcase that fits in nicely with my other bedding. Doesn’t solve my crazy morning hair, but I am noticing less breakage and random hairs all over the pillow. And it’s just really comfortable. No wrinkles, dries quickly after hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: T-bone

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has acne, it seemed to help a little. It was hard to keep wrinkles away after washing and did wear down a bit after.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Nice silk!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very dry,1 been breaking, so my hairdresser suggested using a silk pillowcase. I'm always slept on it one night so I can't tell you how good it's working. But it feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: it's great until you wash it..
customer_reviews.text: Coming back to update my review.. I washed it after 2 weeks, and I'm sad to say it has lost its luster. I followed the washing instructions on the tag and it is no longer silky. The first two weeks were amazing, and now I am left with a sad unsilky pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this product. Not as soft as I had in mind for silk. I would return it but don’t feel like going through all the steps to make the return.
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman1782

customer_reviews.title: Luxuriously inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this pillowcase is heavenly! I don't sleep on pillows but after one night on the black silk one, I sleep no other way. I feel so luxurious with it against my face and even with all the tossing and turning I do I don't end up scratching my face with harsh fabrics. I had been debating between this and an 80 dollar one from a department store but I took the leap of faith and fell into a wonderful sleep. Excellent quality! I'll be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.author: le bear

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair, so it's nice to wake up and not have the back of my head matted up. I also wear eyelash extensions, and I seem to have less shedding with this pillowcase. I've washed it by hand a few times. I rolled it in a dry towel to get the water out, and then draped it over a chair. It drys quickly. I like the zipper, but I would like the pillowcase to be a bit wider and longer.. It works ok with my flat, queen size pillow, but it's a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pillowcases - they are so soft and beautiful. They wash up well - being silk they are thin but they are strong. If you're thinking about buying them, you absolutely should - they are great for your hair and face and it turns sleeping into luxurious experience. I bought a pillowcase for everyone in my family (my four daughters and even my husband) and everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzylicious

customer_reviews.title: Is a 22 dollar pillow case worth it?
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god yes. Yes it is. I am very much a penny pincher but this was so worth it, it's more than a pillow case, it's HEAVEN. I can't imagine going back to using a regular cotton pillow case to be honest. This case is always cool, always comfortable. I love it. LOVE. IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Seems weird, she loves them though
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what this is for, apparently this isn’t a normal pillow case. I got the wife 2 of these for Christmas, she rants and raves about them
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: So great for skin & hair!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the claims of this pillowcase making that much of a difference for my skin and hair, but it turned out to be true! It is so soft on my skin, I’ve been breaking out less, and my hair is so soft and tangle free when I wake up! I’ve been recommending to everyone who listens.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have one.... I wish they were cheaper, I would most definitely buy several more! I love knowing that my hair isn’t getting pulled on during the night. And I love the coolness also. Just wish they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought them for my boyfriend and I because we both try to take the best care of our hair as possible and I have acne, so I have to be gentle with my skin. My hair isn't as crazy in the mornings since I started using these! They're very smooth and cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this beautiful silk pillowcase! Came quickly as promised and packaged beautifully.. Have had silk pillowcases before, but the quality of this one exceeds the ones I've had. So soft, comfortable, perfect size, and the zipper prevents it from slipping off. Will require some special laundry care, (care info supplied by seller), but will be worth it! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: SNRNAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great budget “silk” pillowcases in good colors
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and I LOVE them. I have curly hair and they allow me to go 4ish days between washes. When I accidentally slept on a regular pillowcase at a friends house one night my hair was a nightmare the next day. I’m about to buy a third because my white one got dyed in the wash (someone washed it with 2 blankets I had dyed, not the pillows fault). Super good quality and does the job perfectly for the price!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: No crunchy looking ends! I LOVE this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair and I love this pillow. I was skeptical but my friend bought it for me as a gift. I lived it so much I bought it for my mom and my Fiancé. My hair doesn’t get knotted and my ends don’t get crunchy. It was so noticeable that I hate not bringing it with me when I go on trips. I highly recommend this pillow and I will probably buy an extra one maybe in a darker color to take on trips with me.
customer_reviews.author: Louy816

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful silk case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in ivory and brown. Used ivory case for over a month now. Great quality. I hesitated because of reviews saying cases were thin and they didn't fit. Don't listen. The weight is very good, the material is heavy and smooth - feels like silk should. I have an odd size large pillow for snoring 'abatement' and this case fit it just fine. Accidentally washed in HOT water but only had maybe 1/8" to 1/4" shrinkage either direction. Air dried just fine. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KatMac

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. It does become less soft after washing, even if you use a detergent meant for silk. So not sure how long this will last. Bought this because I cannot wait 3 hours between my skin care routine and sleeping (cotton absorbs products -- wasting my creams). My hair is also less frizzy in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.... easy care and comfortable to sleep on....
customer_reviews.text: Have machine washed these with sheets at least 10 times and then hung up to dry. They have been perfect. Even once forgot to take them out before loading the dryer, but they still came out fine. Have given them to friends as gifts, and they love them too. They do seem to help hair and skin.... Much better than the polyester satin ones in regulating temperature....especially in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Soupernan

customer_reviews.title: Love This Pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pillowcase that would be very soft and not too hot as I have ultra-sensitive skin. This pillowcase has been wonderful! It is soft and very comfortable. I don't awaken because my face is too warm. I love the zipper which keeps the pillow secure in the case. The size is perfect so the case stays smooth--no wrinkles or bunching. I couldn't be happier with the quality and functionality of this pillowcase! I intend to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Talbot

customer_reviews.title: whim purchase based on the facial wrinkle solution
customer_reviews.text: Purchase out of curiosity ~ facial sleep wrinkles disappear? Not so sure about that as of yet. Case IS very comfy and soft. Washes well and does not ‘wrinkle’.
customer_reviews.author: Armchair shopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Believer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillowcase! I bought a few more in different colors. I machine wash on gentle with fabric softener, then lay on top of a towel to dry. Not recommended by vendor but it comes out soft and clean. DO NOT BLEACH! I have been able to get up, just brush my hair in the morning and walk out the door! unheard of! I am a true believer in Silk pillowcases now. Oh and yes no added face wrinkles in the am from my pillowcase, not anymore!!! Love them! They come in pretty colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pillowcase!
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase is perfect! The zipper keeps the case from sliding off the pillow, the material allows my night facial creams to remain on my face instead of being absorbed into the material, and my hair does not look like I walked through a wind tunnel while sleeping. I highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: luxurious
customer_reviews.text: The silk is first quality and washes like a dream. I hung it for a little while and it was ready to go back on the bed. A little vinegar in the rinse water gave it the right finish. I like being able to throw it in the washer and have it come out looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: It Hurts!
customer_reviews.text: Feels like polyester rather than silk . I donor recommend this item to those with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Material
customer_reviews.text: I love this silk pillow cover. It looks wonderful and is so soft to sleep on. My hair loves this and I dont wake up looking like a scarecrow anymore. Worth the money 💰. I havent had to wash it yet so not sure 🤔 about that, but I will try it on my delicate cycle in the washer and line dry.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Soft, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: This pillowcase is perfectly fine. I bought it to see if it would improve skin and hair. I can't really tell a big difference, but I do like the soft feel and I like to think that it's good for my hair and skin. When it's in the wash and I sleep on a regular cotton pillowcase, I do feel like I'm downgrading. Would purchase again, but not a 100% believer in the whole silk pillowcase thing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I've had it for about a week now and love the feeling of sleeping on silk each night. The most impressive part of this experience for me as a customer was when I received an email from Angel at Alaska Bear asking how my experience was, not only did this show the company's true desire to please the customer BUT at the bottom they wrote special instructions for washing/caring for the pillowcase to get the best use out of the product. Very pleased with this purchase!! As a matter of fact, do they make sheet sets?? Looking now!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only?
customer_reviews.text: This pillow case died way too soon. My boyfriend unfortunately is not the sharpest knife when it comes to laundry, and so without thinking to ask me, he put the pillowcase in the wash with the whites that get bleached and also tumble dried. Now it’s a scratchy remnant of what it used to be and I can’t believe I paid over $20 for it. I saw some decent ones for 9.99 on amazon, going with these next time just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a thick, protective plastic package that opened easily and was folded nicely with a paperboard sheet in the middle to keep the package from being limp, I washed it right away on the dedicates mode because I had seen a review saying theirs fell apart after the first wash, but mine washed just fine and came out soft and smooth without any softener or drier sheets!:) After first use my hair (which is curly hair type 3a) was smooth and had no extra frizz unlike when I use cotton sheets. Very happy with my purchase! (Originally got one non-dyed pillow case, I bought another one!)
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Your hair will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised the difference using a silk pillow made on my hair! My hair was always a total mess in the mornings, now it pretty much looks like how it did when I fell asleep. I also have noticed that I don't get those occasional red lines or pillow marks on my face. Overall I'm really pleased with this pillowcase! The price is reasonable compared to other pillow cases on here too. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Saleh

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and cool
customer_reviews.text: in love with the silk pillow case - I went for one because I had read about how they were better for preventing frizzy hair (and wrinkles) but they are cool and soft too. I was a bit concerned that the silk would be shiny and stick out next to to my husband's cotton pillowcase, but it is matte and blends in just fine. I'd say my hair is a bit less frizzy too, although I changed product around the same time as I got the pillowcase so I can't say for certain which it is.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but a little thin
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you really can’t beat this pillowcase. Silk is so good for your skin (keep those crows feet at bay!) and it works wonders for my hair. I honestly don’t wake up with bed head when I use this pillow. I made the mistake of throwing this pillowcase in the wash and didn’t take it out before my husband dried it, so I feel like drying it did change the feel of the fabric a bit. I would recommend using a solid white pillow cover under it because if your pillow has patterns on it or texture, it WILL show through - at least if you get the white one.
customer_reviews.author: Chloenielsen123

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look forward to bedtime!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow case is so smooth, silky, and comfy, that now my fiance wants one for himself! It's just so comfortable! I love the way I sleep on it also - makes my pillow feel brand new, and makes me feel refreshed. I'm going to order a couple more for the two of us. I got the basic white pillow case, and just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ramone

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. If it is actually helping my skin and hair, is yet to be seen, but it is a lot softer and feels nicer than cotton. It feels cooler on my face. I love that. I'll probably buy a couple more at one point or another and replace all my pillow cases, even the guest room pillow cases with these.
customer_reviews.author: LoSa

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair and Skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a great pillow that protects your hair and your skin while you sleep at night. I’ve noticed after a few months that my hair and skin looked better, my hair is shining and with hardly any breakage. Definitely worth the money, especially if you have color treated hair. Also, it’s gentle on your skin, I’m my 40’s so I’m trying to preserve, ha!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Saddened by feel and quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order for my dry hair and skin but have been saddened by the quality of this pillow case. It is not very soft after each wash and is picking very easily. Does not really feel like silk. The zipper is nicely done in this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: J W C

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow case. I got it for my hair because I have very dry frizzy hair, and it really does keep my hair soft and detangled over night. Other than what I bought it for, it is super soft and comfy and it doesn't get too hot. I have the white one and it doesn't stain and it easy to wash. I have a normal sized pillow and it is pretty big lengthwise, and it wrinkles a lot, but I didn't buy it for decorating so I don't mind it
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great for curls
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep my curly hair from tangling. It's also helped a ton with breakouts and I get fewer pillow marks on the side of my face (I'm a side sleeper) when I wake up. I hand wash these when I do some of my bras and it takes very little effort. If you're not into that, just pull them up of the laundry and hang dry them before putting everything else in the dryer. It makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this silk pillowcase. The pillowcase is soft and luxurious. It is helping to keep my hair soft and frizz free. My skin is benefiting because my face is against a soft silky fabric. I love the zipper enclosure which prevents the pillowcase from sliding off the pillow. I would purchase from your company again! Thank you ☺️ BTW thank you for your follow-up to give me instructions on care for the pillowcase so I can maintain and use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Starlene A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: I always like supporting retailers who provide a product (like this silk pillowcase) that is high quality but much less expensive than the name brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: Megster

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I had heard about using a satin pillowcase, and finally decided to buy one. I purchased this one off a recommendation from a Instagram blogger and WOW!! This pillowcase is legit!! I have naturally curly and I blow dry it straight every day. Every morning it was a kinky mess, but not after sleeping on this satin dream!! Every morning now my hair is still soft and silky and straight. Cannot recommend a satin pillowcase enough!! I love mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Muro

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pillowcase. It has a zipper with is great. Got it for my super curly haired daughter to help fight frizz. She loves how cool it is as she is a hot sleeper. Will order more as I can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K.

customer_reviews.title: like any other silk pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: I learned a lot reading the reviews, particularly about cleaning this thing. I was hoping the pillowcase would keep pillow lines from forming on my face overnight, but no such luck. So, it doesn't seem much different that the other silk pillowcase I was using. It is super slippery though, so I have to adjust it a lot to keep it from sliding between my mattress & the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: slb

customer_reviews.title: We are all very pleased. I no longer have crazy hair in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for myself and gifts for Mother's Day. We are all very pleased. I no longer have crazy hair in the morning and best of all, no creases on my face! I intend to handwash with a gentle soap as I want to keep it looking as beautiful as it does for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: amy ro

customer_reviews.title: Its soft
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 and very thin. You can see my brand of pillow through it. Bought it because friends said it would be amazing for my hair. I've not noticed any difference between the silk pillowcase and my tshirt material pillowcase. Over all it's not a bad pillow case, it is very soft, just you can see through it and does nothing for the hair.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rawls

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This product ripped after washing it a couple of times. I have a cheaper silk case that I only paid 5 bucks from Fred's that is still going strong for years. This was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Suave 777

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she really likes it. I then inherited her old ones, which I also like.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: No more creases!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I had been waking up with knotted hair and creases from my pillow. It arrived and I used it right away. It is soft and cozy. It seems to keep me cool when I am warm and warm when cool. When I have blown out my hair I can now wear it for a couple of days. It seems to be made of good quality and has held up nicely when washing. I wash with other delicates and place it in a lingerie bag.
customer_reviews.author: ka1jones4

customer_reviews.title: I love sleeping on it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. I love sleeping on it. It’s exactly what I wanted. In fact I bought another one .
customer_reviews.author: Ann S

customer_reviews.title: If you need a pillowcas that stays cool this is it
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest coolest pillowcase I have ever slept on. I bought it in Ivory because that was the only color I could get delivered by Christmas at the time we decided to order it. I would not recommend the ivory, it is already showing stains. I will be ordering a couple more soon in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: TDH

customer_reviews.title: Have enjoyed so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far! My face feels less congested when I wake up and haven't had any new breakouts since switching to these pillowcases. Very soft and comfortable, and I really like the zip. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Paulding

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have greatly enjoyed my pillow case. It is like treating yourself to a little something extra special when you go to bed. It also serves its purpose of maintaining the shape of my curls at night so I dont have to wash my hair as often. I would definitely recommend if you have curly hair or just want a little treat at night. Just hand wash, tumble dry on air no heat, and lightly iron if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ALASKA BEAR Natural Silk Pillowcase, Hypoallergenic, 19 Momme, 600 Thread Count 100 Percent Mulberry Silk, Queen Size with Hidden Zipper (1, Ivory White)
feature_bullets: ✅【100% MULBERRY SILK & HYPOALLERGENIC】100% 19 momme mulberry silk, 600 thread count, a sensuously smooth, strong, hypoallergenic and breathable natural, organic fiber
✅【COOL TOUCH & ULTRA SMOOTH】Dermatologists recommend natural silk pillow cases for the cool touch and breathability. Great for preventing wrinkles, dry skin and frizzled hair, and morning bed head
✅【HIDDEN ZIPPER】Hidden zipper for style, comfort and better fit; Handmade, top-quality workmanship that lasts
✅【QUEEN SIZE】20 x 30 inches (51 cm x 76 cm), fits most queen-sized pillows
✅【ALL NATURAL】Chemical-free, naturally dyed, no color shading or fading; "Makes a great gift for anyone who enjoys deep, restorative sleep!"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,012 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
